text: Creator is a 1985 American comedy movie directed by Ivan Passer and was based on the 1980 novel of the same name by Jeremy Leven. It stars Peter O'Toole, Mariel Hemingway, Vincent Spano, Virginia Madsen, David Ogden Stiers, John Dehner, Ian Wolfe, Kenneth Tigar, Jeff Corey and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ivan Passer
title: Creator (movie)
